A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I left Star Wars 8 soooooo disappointed.........

The visuals were good\, even liked the old throw back puppet. BUT...

-Story was really bad
-No character development (between 7-8)
-Story line doesn't jive with the past movies at all. (Luke and Kylo)
-Everything from the past is irreverent. Everyone died for nothing seems like.
-Snoke was pointless\, Vader was supposed to be the best and now everyone has super powers.(Rey) 


Just sucked....
